<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

Manages a Named Location within Azure Active Directory.

## API Permissions

The following API permissions are required in order to use this resource.

When authenticated with a service principal, this resource requires the following application roles: `Policy.ReadWrite.ConditionalAccess` and `Policy.Read.All`

When authenticated with a user principal, this resource requires one of the following directory roles: `Conditional Access Administrator` or `Global Administrator`

{{% examples %}}

## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}





{{< example csharp >}}

```csharp
using Pulumi;
using AzureAD = Pulumi.AzureAD;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var example_ip = new AzureAD.NamedLocation("example-ip", new AzureAD.NamedLocationArgs
        {
            DisplayName = "IP Named Location",
            Ip = new AzureAD.Inputs.NamedLocationIpArgs
            {
                IpRanges = 
                {
                    "1.1.1.1/32",
                    "2.2.2.2/32",
                },
                Trusted = true,
            },
        });
        var example_country = new AzureAD.NamedLocation("example-country", new AzureAD.NamedLocationArgs
        {
            Country = new AzureAD.Inputs.NamedLocationCountryArgs
            {
                CountriesAndRegions = 
                {
                    "GB",
                    "US",
                },
                IncludeUnknownCountriesAndRegions = false,
            },
            DisplayName = "Country Named Location",
        });
    }

}
```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example go >}}

```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azuread/sdk/v5/go/azuread"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := azuread.NewNamedLocation(ctx, "example_ip", &azuread.NamedLocationArgs{
			DisplayName: pulumi.String("IP Named Location"),
			Ip: &NamedLocationIpArgs{
				IpRanges: pulumi.StringArray{
					pulumi.String("1.1.1.1/32"),
					pulumi.String("2.2.2.2/32"),
				},
				Trusted: pulumi.Bool(true),
			},
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		_, err = azuread.NewNamedLocation(ctx, "example_country", &azuread.NamedLocationArgs{
			Country: &NamedLocationCountryArgs{
				CountriesAndRegions: pulumi.StringArray{
					pulumi.String("GB"),
					pulumi.String("US"),
				},
				IncludeUnknownCountriesAndRegions: pulumi.Bool(false),
			},
			DisplayName: pulumi.String("Country Named Location"),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example python >}}

```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_azuread as azuread

example_ip = azuread.NamedLocation("example-ip",
    display_name="IP Named Location",
    ip=azuread.NamedLocationIpArgs(
        ip_ranges=[
            "1.1.1.1/32",
            "2.2.2.2/32",
        ],
        trusted=True,
    ))
example_country = azuread.NamedLocation("example-country",
    country=azuread.NamedLocationCountryArgs(
        countries_and_regions=[
            "GB",
            "US",
        ],
        include_unknown_countries_and_regions=False,
    ),
    display_name="Country Named Location")
```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example typescript >}}


```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as azuread from "@pulumi/azuread";

const example_ip = new azuread.NamedLocation("example-ip", {
    displayName: "IP Named Location",
    ip: {
        ipRanges: [
            "1.1.1.1/32",
            "2.2.2.2/32",
        ],
        trusted: true,
    },
});
const example_country = new azuread.NamedLocation("example-country", {
    country: {
        countriesAndRegions: [
            "GB",
            "US",
        ],
        includeUnknownCountriesAndRegions: false,
    },
    displayName: "Country Named Location",
});
```


{{< /example >}}

<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_country_csharp">

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}A `country` block as documented below, which configures a country-based named location.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_displayname_csharp">
<a href="#state_displayname_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Display<wbr>Name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The friendly name for this named location.

            title="Optional">

## Supporting Types



<h4 id="namedlocationcountry">Named<wbr>Location<wbr>Country</h4>

{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="countriesandregions_csharp">
<a href="#countriesandregions_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Countries<wbr>And<wbr>Regions</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List&lt;string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}List of countries and/or regions in two-letter format specified by ISO 3166-2.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="includeunknowncountriesandregions_csharp">
<a href="#includeunknowncountriesandregions_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Include<wbr>Unknown<wbr>Countries<wbr>And<wbr>Regions</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Whether IP addresses that don't map to a country or region should be included in the named location. Defaults to `false`.
{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

{{% choosable language go %}}
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="countriesandregions_go">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">[]string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}List of countries and/or regions in two-letter format specified by ISO 3166-2.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="includeunknowncountriesandregions_go">
<a href="#includeunknowncountriesandregions_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Include<wbr>Unknown<wbr>Countries<wbr>And<wbr>Regions</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Whether IP addresses that don't map to a country or region should be included in the named location. Defaults to `false`.
{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

{{% choosable language nodejs %}}

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">boolean</span>

<h4 id="namedlocationip">Named<wbr>Location<wbr>Ip</h4>

{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="ipranges_csharp">
<a href="#ipranges_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Ip<wbr>Ranges</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List&lt;string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}List of IP address ranges in IPv4 CIDR format (e.g. 1.2.3.4/32) or any allowable IPv6 format from IETF RFC596.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="trusted_csharp">
<a href="#trusted_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Trusted</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Whether the named location is trusted. Defaults to `false`.
{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">[]string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}List of IP address ranges in IPv4 CIDR format (e.g. 1.2.3.4/32) or any allowable IPv6 format from IETF RFC596.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="trusted_go">
<a href="#trusted_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Trusted</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Whether the named location is trusted. Defaults to `false`.
{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

## Import


Named Locations can be imported using the `id`, e.g.

```sh
 $ pulumi import azuread:index/namedLocation:NamedLocation my_location 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000
```

<dl class="package-details">
	<dt>Repository</dt>
	<dd><a href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azuread">https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-azuread</a></dd>
	<dt>License</dt>
	<dd>Apache-2.0</dd>
	<dt>Notes</dt>
	<dd>{{% md %}}This Pulumi package is based on the [`azuread` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform-provider-azuread).{{% /md %}}</dd>
</dl>
